channel.title: Project czar
channel.description:
ok im makin a project czar server and i need help with a couple things:
1. can some1 give me a good compiler
2. i will need some1 to help me with problems if i run into any (probably its not lettin me get on server when its running)
3.is it a good server i think it is YES i want to know YOUR opinion
4.ill edit later if i need it
so if any1 can help me ill give co,admin,mod,or membership if help

item.title: Project czar
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

@echo off
title Compiler
echo Auorin’s Compiler
echo Created by The Hidd3n
echo ________________________________________________________________________________
color 0a
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

simple compiler, works well

Read full topic

item.description:
@Freezscapev2 wrote:

Hey This is the best Compiler my compiler was not working before it was giving me error then i was Coding This Try it is is the best compiler
Code
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
